data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Licko-Senjska to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Licko-Senjska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Licko-Senjska.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 46,867 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Licko-Senjska to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Bosniak people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Bosniak people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Bosniak people is yours.
Lord, please give the 215 believers in the state of Licko-Senjska the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Licko-Senjska, Croatia.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Licko-Senjska, Croatia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
